languages.text: "Я ожидал подобного поворота. По крайней мере, мы больше не на арене — здесь ксеносов, способных нам противостоять, намного меньше".
"I expected something like this. At least we are no longer in the arena — there are far fewer xenos here capable of opposing us."
languages.original_text: "Я ожидал подобного поворота. По крайней мере, мы больше не на арене — здесь ксеносов, способных нам противостоять, намного меньше".

traits.locale_text: "I expected something like this. At least we are no longer in the arena — there are far fewer xenos here capable of opposing us."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I expected something like this. At least we are no longer in the arena — there are far fewer xenos here capable of opposing us."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I expected something like this. At least we are no longer in the arena — there are far fewer xenos here capable of opposing us."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I expected something like this. At least we are no longer in the arena — there are far fewer xenos here capable of opposing us."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「こいつは期待どおりです。少なくとも、闘技場の中ではありません…つまり、ここに我らを相手どれる異種族は、ほとんどいないということです」
languages.original_text: "I expected something like this. At least we are no longer in the arena — there are far fewer xenos here capable of opposing us."

traits.locale_text: 「こいつは期待どおりです。少なくとも、闘技場の中ではありません…つまり、ここに我らを相手どれる異種族は、ほとんどいないということです」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我早就料到会发生这样的事。至少我们现在已经离开竞技场了。在竞技场以外的地方，能与我们抗衡的异形少之又少。”
languages.original_text: "I expected something like this. At least we are no longer in the arena — there are far fewer xenos here capable of opposing us."

traits.locale_text: “我早就料到会发生这样的事。至少我们现在已经离开竞技场了。在竞技场以外的地方，能与我们抗衡的异形少之又少。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je m'attendais à quelque chose de ce genre. Au moins, nous sommes sortis de l'arène. Les xénos capables de s'opposer à nous seront moins nombreux ici. »
languages.original_text: "I expected something like this. At least we are no longer in the arena — there are far fewer xenos here capable of opposing us."

traits.locale_text: « Je m'attendais à quelque chose de ce genre. Au moins, nous sommes sortis de l'arène. Les xénos capables de s'opposer à nous seront moins nombreux ici. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Esperaba algo semejante. Al menos ya no estamos en el campo de batalla; aquí hay bastantes menos xenos que puedan hacernos frente».
languages.original_text: "I expected something like this. At least we are no longer in the arena — there are far fewer xenos here capable of opposing us."

traits.locale_text: «Esperaba algo semejante. Al menos ya no estamos en el campo de batalla; aquí hay bastantes menos xenos que puedan hacernos frente».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich hatte so etwas erwartet. Immerhin sind wir nicht mehr in der Arena ... hier gibt es deutlich weniger Xenos, die sich mit uns messen können."
languages.original_text: "I expected something like this. At least we are no longer in the arena — there are far fewer xenos here capable of opposing us."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte so etwas erwartet. Immerhin sind wir nicht mehr in der Arena ... hier gibt es deutlich weniger Xenos, die sich mit uns messen können."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Böyle bir şeyler çıkmasını bekliyordum. En azından artık arenada değiliz... Burada bize kafa tutabilecek zeno sayısı çok daha az."
languages.original_text: "I expected something like this. At least we are no longer in the arena — there are far fewer xenos here capable of opposing us."

traits.locale_text: "Böyle bir şeyler çıkmasını bekliyordum. En azından artık arenada değiliz... Burada bize kafa tutabilecek zeno sayısı çok daha az."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
